law.text: Any investment fund approved to make qualified investments pursuant to KRS 154.20-250 to 154.20-284 prior to July 1, 2002, unless otherwise approved by the authority, shall continue to operate and be granted credits pursuant to the agreement entered into and the rules, regulations, and procedures adopted by the authority prior to July 15, 2002.
law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 230, sec. 24, effective July 15, 2002.
